snippet.title: ABC News quiz: What do you remember from the news this week?
snippet.content:
This week, Prince Phillip retired from public life, a rock-and-roll calf was born in Texas, and we lost the voice of Australian football. Will you succeed in our quiz like Anthony Scaramucci the hedge fund manager or fall in a blaze of glory like Anthony Scaramucci the White House communications director? Find out!
External Link:
